segments.text: There's a car waiting for you just outside the door . Right this way , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me put your cases into the trunk and please get in the back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's comfortable , but now I'm a little tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll reach the Beijing hotel in another ten minutes . When we arrived there , you can go up and have a rest . The hotel has very good service , and it's considered as one of the best hotels here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! I lived there when I came to Beijing last time . It's comfortable and beautiful .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If it's convenient for you , Mr . Wu would like to invite you to the banquet in honor of you in the evening .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you ! I will . When and where will the dinner be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At six o'clock in the International Hotel . We'll pick you up this afternoon . Besides , if you care for visiting , we'll arrange some sightseeing for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's nice . Thank you for arranging all of this .
segments.speaker: S2
